name: WF001: Time entry is created in Toggl to SM v0.1 copy

parameters.query:
WITH 
  client_ref AS 
  (
  SELECT * FROM input1
  ),
  project as 
  (
  select * from input3
  ),
  time_entry  AS
  (
  select
    client_ref.id AS client_id, 
    client_ref.name AS client_name,
    client_ref.record_id AS client_record_id,
    project.record_id AS proj_record_id,
    project.id AS project_id, 
    project.name AS proj_name,
    input2.id AS time_entry_id,
    input2.*
  from input2
    INNER JOIN project ON project.id = input2.project_id
    LEFT JOIN client_ref ON client_ref.id = project.client_id
  )
select * from time_entry;

with 
  client_ref as
  (
  select * from input1
  )
  SELECT 
      client_ref.id as client_id, 
      client_ref.name as client_name,
      client_ref.wid as client_wid,
      client_ref.archived as client_archived, 
      client_ref.at as client_created_at,
      client_ref.creator_id as client_created_id,
      client_ref.record_id as client_record_id,
      a.id as time_entry_id,
      a.*,
      b.record_id as proj_record_id,
      b.id as project_id, 
      b.name as project_name, 
      b.*
  FROM input2 a, 
      input3 b
         inner join client_ref on client_ref.id = b.client_id
WHERE a.project_id = b.id

parameters.content:
## Single Item Loop
We process each workflow item one at a time, We first check Github to see if a file exists then we merge the Github Data and the API item so we can check if the values match in the function node `isDiffOrNew` we then set a status of `same`, `different` or `new`
